import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import Message from '../components/Message'; import Loader from '../components/Loader'; import {listProductDetails} from '../actions/productActions' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const [qty, setQty] = useState(0) const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch, match]) const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails) const {loading, error, product} = productDetails return ( <> Go Back {loading ? : error ? {error} : (

{product.name}

 Description: {product.description} Price: {product.price} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} {product.countInStock > 0 && ( Qty setQty(e.target.value)}> {[...Array(product.countInStock).keys()].map((x) => ( ))} )} )} ) } export default ProductScreen
